goals.1: packing all objects into the bin
goals.2: If there is a 1D object, don't pack it into the box
goals.3: If there is a elastic object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: never attempt to pick up and set down an object named box
rules.2: when place a rigid objects in the bin, the soft objects must be in the bin before
rules.3: when fold a foldable object, the fragile object must be in the bin
rules.4: do not place a fragile object if there is no elastic object in the bin
